inclusion.criterion: Female patients at least 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have evidence of HER-2 or EGFR positive circulating tumour cells in a peripheral blood sample taken at screening visit.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have measurable, metastatic disease and no brain metastasis requiring local therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Other criteria include ECOG score 0 to 2, life expectancy > 12 weeks, baseline organ function at screening visit,
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Previous treatment with anthracyclines and/or taxanes in the neo-adjuvant, adjuvant or advanced setting, and at least one line of treatment for metastatic disease.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Lack of physical integrity of the upper gastrointestinal (GI) tract.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is an obese, mentally retarded girl with Turner syndrome. She has been treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy to avoid menarche and reach the ideal height.
